languages.text: {n}Инфопластина Йегер мигает паническим алым.{/n} "Авгуры фиксируют аномальную сейсмическую активность — кто-то начал заряжать циклонные бомбы в недрах Летуса. Духи машин не принимают контрлитании. Планете конец — мы не можем это остановить..." {n}Тонкие губы сжимаются в белую полосу, инфопластина падает на пол.{/n}

{n}Yeager's data-slate is flashing a panicked red.{/n} "The augurs are recording anomalous seismic activity: someone has started arming the cyclonic bombs in the bowels of Leethus. The machine spirits are rejecting all counter-litanies. The planet is done for. We cannot stop this..." {n}Her lips tighten into a white streak, and her data-slate falls to the floor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Инфопластина Йегер мигает паническим алым.{/n} "Авгуры фиксируют аномальную сейсмическую активность — кто-то начал заряжать циклонные бомбы в недрах Летуса. Духи машин не принимают контрлитании. Планете конец — мы не можем это остановить..." {n}Тонкие губы сжимаются в белую полосу, инфопластина падает на пол.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yeager's data-slate is flashing a panicked red.{/n} "The augurs are recording anomalous seismic activity, someone has started charging cyclonic bombs in the bowels of Leethus. The machine spirits are rejecting counter-litanies. The planet is done for, we cannot stop this..." {n}The thin lips tighten into a white streak, and the data-slate falls to the floor.{/n}

The machine spirits are rejecting all counter-litanies. The planet is done for. We cannot stop this..." {n}Her lips tighten into a white streak, and her data-slate falls to the floor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tablilla de datos de Yeager se ilumina con un rojo alarmante.{/n} «Los augures registran una actividad sísmica anómala: alguien ha iniciado el proceso de activación de las bombas ciclónicas en las entrañas de Leethus. Los espíritus máquina rechazan todas las contraletanías. Este planeta está acabado. No podemos detenerlo...». {n}Aprieta los labios en una línea blanquecina y su tablilla de datos cae al suelo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yeager's data-slate is flashing a panicked red.{/n} "The augurs are recording anomalous seismic activity: someone has started arming the cyclonic bombs in the bowels of Leethus. The machine spirits are rejecting all counter-litanies. The planet is done for. We cannot stop this..." {n}Her lips tighten into a white streak, and her data-slate falls to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tablilla de datos de Yeager se ilumina con un rojo alarmante.{/n} «Los augures registran una actividad sísmica anómala: alguien ha iniciado el proceso de activación de las bombas ciclónicas en las entrañas de Leethus. Los espíritus máquina rechazan todas las contraletanías. Este planeta está acabado. No podemos detenerlo...». {n}Aprieta los labios en una línea blanquecina y su tablilla de datos cae al suelo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}耶格尔的数据板闪着充满恐慌意味的红光。{/n}“俄歇矩阵探测到异常地震活动，有人正在启动利瑟斯内部的旋风炸弹。机魂拒绝一切反制措施。这颗行星已经完蛋了，我们无法阻止这一切……”{n}她的嘴唇紧紧地抿成了一条白线，手中的数据板也掉在了地上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yeager's data-slate is flashing a panicked red.{/n} "The augurs are recording anomalous seismic activity: someone has started arming the cyclonic bombs in the bowels of Leethus. The machine spirits are rejecting all counter-litanies. The planet is done for. We cannot stop this..." {n}Her lips tighten into a white streak, and her data-slate falls to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}耶格尔的数据板闪着充满恐慌意味的红光。{/n}“俄歇矩阵探测到异常地震活动，有人正在启动利瑟斯内部的旋风炸弹。机魂拒绝一切反制措施。这颗行星已经完蛋了，我们无法阻止这一切……”{n}她的嘴唇紧紧地抿成了一条白线，手中的数据板也掉在了地上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}イェーガーのデータスレートが赤く点滅している。{/n}「オーガーは異常な地震活動を記録しています。何者かがリーザスの底にあるサイクロン爆弾で武装を開始しています。機械精霊がカウンターリタニアをすべて拒否しています。惑星はもう終わりです。私たちでは、これを止めることができません…」{n}彼女は白い筋ができるほどきつく唇を閉じる。そしてデータスレートが床に落ちる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yeager's data-slate is flashing a panicked red.{/n} "The augurs are recording anomalous seismic activity: someone has started arming the cyclonic bombs in the bowels of Leethus. The machine spirits are rejecting all counter-litanies. The planet is done for. We cannot stop this..." {n}Her lips tighten into a white streak, and her data-slate falls to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イェーガーのデータスレートが赤く点滅している。{/n}「オーガーは異常な地震活動を記録しています。何者かがリーザスの底にあるサイクロン爆弾で武装を開始しています。機械精霊がカウンターリタニアをすべて拒否しています。惑星はもう終わりです。私たちでは、これを止めることができません…」{n}彼女は白い筋ができるほどきつく唇を閉じる。そしてデータスレートが床に落ちる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Comme en proie à un vent de panique, la plaque de données de Yeager émet force clignotements rouges.{/n} « Les augures enregistrent une activité sismique anormale : quelqu'un a commencé à armer les bombes cycloniques posées dans les entrailles de Leethus. Les esprits de la machine rejettent obstinément toutes les contre-litanies. La planète est condamnée. Il n'y a plus rien à faire... » {n}Ses lèvres se serrent au point d'en devenir exsangues et sa plaque de données lui échappe des mains.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yeager's data-slate is flashing a panicked red.{/n} "The augurs are recording anomalous seismic activity: someone has started arming the cyclonic bombs in the bowels of Leethus. The machine spirits are rejecting all counter-litanies. The planet is done for. We cannot stop this..." {n}Her lips tighten into a white streak, and her data-slate falls to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme en proie à un vent de panique, la plaque de données de Yeager émet force clignotements rouges.{/n} « Les augures enregistrent une activité sismique anormale : quelqu'un a commencé à armer les bombes cycloniques posées dans les entrailles de Leethus. Les esprits de la machine rejettent obstinément toutes les contre-litanies. La planète est condamnée. Il n'y a plus rien à faire... » {n}Ses lèvres se serrent au point d'en devenir exsangues et sa plaque de données lui échappe des mains.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yeager'ın databelası, aniden kırmızı renkte yanıp sönüyor.{/n} "Alametler, anormal bir sismik aktivite kaydediyor: Birisi Leethus'un derinliklerindeki siklonik bombaları etkinleştirmeye başladı. Makine ruhları, tüm karşıt ilahileri reddediyor. Gezegenin işi bitti. Bunu durduramayız..." {n}Dudakları bembeyaz, ince bir çizgi hâlinde geriliyor ve databelası yere düşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yeager's data-slate is flashing a panicked red.{/n} "The augurs are recording anomalous seismic activity: someone has started arming the cyclonic bombs in the bowels of Leethus. The machine spirits are rejecting all counter-litanies. The planet is done for. We cannot stop this..." {n}Her lips tighten into a white streak, and her data-slate falls to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yeager'ın databelası, aniden kırmızı renkte yanıp sönüyor.{/n} "Alametler, anormal bir sismik aktivite kaydediyor: Birisi Leethus'un derinliklerindeki siklonik bombaları etkinleştirmeye başladı. Makine ruhları, tüm karşıt ilahileri reddediyor. Gezegenin işi bitti. Bunu durduramayız..." {n}Dudakları bembeyaz, ince bir çizgi hâlinde geriliyor ve databelası yere düşüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yeagers Datablock beginnt rot zu blinken.{/n} "Die Auguren melden abnorme seismische Aktivitäten: Jemand hat mit der Aktivierung der zyklonischen Bomben im Inneren von Leethus begonnen. Die Maschinengeister verweigern alle Gegengesänge. Der Planet ist verloren. Wir können es nicht aufhalten ..." {n}Sie presst die Lippen zusammen und ihr Datablock fällt zu Boden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yeager's data-slate is flashing a panicked red.{/n} "The augurs are recording anomalous seismic activity: someone has started arming the cyclonic bombs in the bowels of Leethus. The machine spirits are rejecting all counter-litanies. The planet is done for. We cannot stop this..." {n}Her lips tighten into a white streak, and her data-slate falls to the floor.{/n}
